Untextured geometry
[Drawing]

Untextured geometry (rectangles, lines, etc.). More...

Detailed Description

Untextured geometry (rectangles, lines, etc.).

  • No$gba doesn't recognize lines ("flat triangles"), rendering lines & empty rectangles as invisible.
  • Do not enable edge antialiasing when drawing lines else they'll be too fine and invisible on DS.

Draws a 4 corner gradient-filled rectangle.

Parameters:
color1 Color used for the top-left corner.
color2 Color used for the top-right corner.
color3 Color used for the bottom-left corner.
color4 Color used for the bottom-right corner.
